p: The completeness of the combined assembly was assessed by comparing the transcripts to the Benchmarking Universal Single-Copy Orthologs (BUSCO) plant database ( Sim√£o et al., 2015). BUSCO performs a quantitative analysis of how complete an assembly is based on evolutionary expectations of the content of universal single-copy orthologous genes (present in approximately 90% of plants). The R. mangle de novo assembly characterized herein recovered the majority orthologous sequences from the BUSCO plant dataset (97.1%), of which 94% were complete and 2.4% were fragmented sequences.
